Search CDEC Stations

cdec_stations.Rd

search the stations in thec CDEC system using the CDEC Station Search service here. Combinations of these parameters can be supplied to refine or be left out to generalize, at least one must be supplied.

cdec_stations(station_id = NULL, nearby_city = NULL, river_basin = NULL,
  hydro_area = NULL, county = NULL)

Arguments

station_id

string three letter station code
nearby_city

string search stations near supplied city
river_basin

string search stations in supplied basin
hydro_area

string search stations in supplied hydrological area
county

string search stations in supplied county

Examples

# cdec_stations() can be used to find locations within an area of interest
cdec_stations(county = "alameda")
#> # A tibble: 27 x 9
#>    station_id name    river_basin county longitude latitude elevation operator 
#>    <chr>      <chr>   <chr>       <chr>      <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>     <chr>    
#>  1 dco        del va… east bay    alame…     -122.     37.6 542 &nbsp CA Dept …
#>  2 oso        oaklan… east bay    alame…     -122.     37.8 1000 &nb… Oakland …
#>  3 chb        chabot  alameda cr  alame…     -122.     37.7 250 &nbsp East Bay…
#>  4 bth        bethan… delta       alame…     -122.     37.8 250 &nbsp CA Dept …
#>  5 cvc        castro… east bay    alame…     -122.     37.7 100 &nbsp US Geolo…
#>  6 aln        alamed… alameda cr  alame…     -122.     37.6 86 &nbsp  US Geolo…
#>  7 cad        calave… alameda cr  alame…     -122.     37.6 1140 &nb… San Fran…
#>  8 usl        u san … alameda cr  alame…     -122.     37.8 477 &nbsp East Bay…
#>  9 ono        oaklan… east bay    alame…     -122.     37.9 1500 &nb… Oakland …
#> 10 nbv        vallec… sf bay      alame…     -122.     37.6 635 &nbsp CA Dept …
#> # ... with 17 more rows, and 1 more variable: state <chr>
# or it can be used to get metadata attributes for a location
cdec_stations(station_id = "ccr")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 9
#>   station_id name     river_basin county longitude latitude elevation operator 
#>   <chr>      <chr>    <chr>       <chr>      <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>     <chr>    
#> 1 ccr        sacrame… sacramento… shasta     -122.     40.5 450 &nbsp US Burea…
#> # ... with 1 more variable: state <chr>
